Taco rice #

Ingredients #

  • 1 cup long grain white rice
  • 1/8 small onion
  • 1 clove garlic
  • 1 Tbsp tomato paste
  • 1 3/4 cups water, divided, .25 cup first, then 1.5 cups
  • 1 tsp Knorr caldo de pollo
  • 1/2 tsp salt
  • 3 Tbsp corn oil
  • 4 cups rice
  • 7 cups water
  • 1/2 small onion
  • 4 cloves garlic
  • 2 tablespoons caldo de pollo
